str.singular: Select someone to challenge from list (on the left) first
You can't challenge yourself, select someone else.
Type your message here and press Enter
Playercards are not available for unregistered users.
(Use the above menu to challenge other players to a game or to answer challenges coming to you)
(Use the menus above to create a new single- or multiplayer game, or to join an already created game)
(Use the above menu to start training the game or playing one of the tracksets with top lists)
%1 left the lobby (connection issue or browser closed)
No other users in this lobby
1 other user in this lobby, 1 of them in game
%1 other users in this lobby, 1 of them in game
%1 other users in this lobby, %2 of them in games
W e l c o m e !
This person is answering another challenge.
This person has just challenged someone else.
This person doesn't accept challenges right now.
(Note! You can't make track records with this setting!)
Select audience member to remove first
You can only remove members of the audience from the game, not other players.
You can't remove yourself from game
Type your message here and press Enter
Select the person you want to challenge from the list on the left first.
You can't challenge yourself, select someone else.
As a unregistered or unconfirmed user, you are unable to chat in lobby area. If you wish, you can <register> immediately.
As unregistered user, you can't chat in lobby area. You can <register> here.
You can't challenge the same user too many times within a short time frame (challenge someone else or wait a while before challenging this user again).
Your message is not yet sent to prevent flooding (too many messages in too short period of time)
Note that user %1, to whom you started writing a private message, has left the chat.
This is a silent game room, chatting is disabled.
You can't chat without a Playforia account (<create account>)
As an unregistered user, you can chat only while playing (<register>)
You need to confirm your email before you can chat.
You need to confirm your email address before you can chat
You have to confirm your email address before you can chat
You have to <create a Playforia nickname> before you can chat
W e l c o m e !

You just got your first ranking points for this game!

You can check your own game history and exact ranking for each game at
Profile > Statistics (main menu)

Other people best rankings you'll find from
Games > Ranking

Congratulations! You just made your own personal record!

It will be displayed in the game, but you can also check your own game statistics at
Profile -> Statistics (main menu)

Global score lists for this and other Playforia games can be found from
Games -> Records

Since you are playing without a Playforia account, your personal game statistics will not be saved.

After creating a free account, you'll get a unique nickname and avatar, your personal game statistics and also take part in the famous Star League.

Your game score has not been saved, since you have not yet created a Playforia account.

By creating an account on Playforia, you get your personal game statistics, records and settings, along with a whole bunch of other cool features!
You may still enter directly to the game by entering your desired nick below:
( ~ character is added to your nick to mark that you are a guest player )
Invalid nickname (use only letters and numbers).
You need to have a nickname
Nick is already in use, choose another
Registering is totally free but it gives you:
- an unique nickname and playercard with statistics
- your scores will be saved to top lists and rankings
- your game settings will be saved
Logging in as registered user failed!
If you want to register or log in, you may do it in Playforia main page.
Click following button to return to the main page:
Your opponent is not here yet.
NOTE! This is clan match that will affect clan rankings.
Match error occured! Unable to start clan match
Game settings are invalid or logging in failed
You are banned from this game.
You've been removed from the game.
A sheriff kicked you out and banned you from this game.

The firewall might prevent the game from making a TCP-connection to %1 (port %2). In case you are using some community computer, it might be that this community has some general firewall in it's network. In this case, contact your local system administrator.
Verify if your connection still works, by f.e. reloading this page.
If this is the case, the Playforia administrators will be notified automatically. Please try again after a few moments.
The game server is not running (possible but very unlikely)
Most of the games can handle a short disconnection from the server. If the connection is lost for a longer period of time, the game will be interrupted. Try reloading this page.
An error occured that can't be handled by the game. A notification has automatically been send to Playforia administrators. Possible problems will be fixed as quickly as possible.
The Playforia administrators will be notified automatically and problems will be fixed as quickly as possible. Please try again after a few moments.
The game server shut down (possible but very unlikely)
Your internet connection disconnected or a firewall prevents connecting to the server.
You've already logged into the game from another location.
You've been removed from the game.
A sheriff kicked you out of this game.
Failed to log in with your Playforia account.
The server is unable to log you into this game with your current account. Please return to the main page and check if you are still logged in.

We are sorry to inform you that the game was closed due to an unexpected error. If the game was still connected to the server when the error occured, the Playforia Team will automatically informed about it.
(Please try again later or play some other Playforia games)
The server is shutting down. Please try again after a while!
Too many connections from the same IP address.
Server/client version-conflict, try to clear browser cache and restart browser
(In many browser it is enough to reload this page by pressing Shift- or Ctrl-key on keyboard and click browser's Reload/Refresh-button))
You can only use this feature if you have a Playforia account. Creating an account is simple and fast, and totally free.
After you've created your account, you can use it at all times. You'll also gain access to many extras throughout the Playforia services.
If you already have an account, you're not logged in. You can log in at Playforia's front page.
After sending a text message (SMS), wait and do not close this window. Close this window only if you do not wish to send a text message (SMS).
This service is temporarily unavailable. The problem will be fixed as soon as possible, please try again later. Close this window to continue.

Text
%1
to number %2


The message fee is %3 and the service works with the following operators: %4
This order must be made in %1, after this time the offer is automatically cancelled.
This purchase can't proceed any longer. Close this window to continue.
Opening coin purchase in new window...
For some reason, this product is not currently available with coins. Please try again later.
Purchase failed, close this window and try again
Purchase failed because you seem to not have enough coins
Purchase completed, you can continue now by closing this window.
After you have purchased coins, click following button to update your balance.
The game is not finished yet! Are you sure you want to quit in the middle of the game?
Game over. Your score was not saved on high score lists because you're not registered user.
Your behaviour is inappropriate. Please stop this or you will be removed from this game!
Your nickname is inappropriate! Delete your current account and create a new, appropriate one. If you continue using this nickname, your whole account will be deleted.
Your nickname is inappropriate! Please quit this game immediately and log in with a different nickname.
The chat was cleared by a sheriff or administrator due to private or inappropriate messaging.
It is inappropriate to search for sex or make sexual related comments in the Playforia chats. Please stop this right away!
You have been muted by sheriff for %1 minutes.
You have been unmuted by a sheriff.
You are currently muted by sheriff for %1 minutes, other people won't see your chat messages.
An error occured during mailing. We apologize for this and won't disturb you any more.

Tell your friends about this cool game, it takes just a few seconds. Type your friends email addresses below and click "Send". (We do not collect e-mail addresses you enter, the mail will only be sent once. We don't like spam either.)
